name: pdb
help: path to a PDB file with input RNA structure

name: start_bp
help: starting basepair to be used in structure format: [CHAIN ID][NT1 NUM]-[CHAIN ID][NT2 NUM]

name: end_bp
help: ending basepair to be used in structure format: [CHAIN ID][NT1 NUM]-[CHAIN ID][NT2 NUM]

name: designs
help: number of designs to create. Default is 1

name: log_level
help: level for global logging

name: extra_pdbs
help: deliminted list of other pdbs used in building

name: ensembles
help: deliminted list of other ensembles

name: dump_intermediate_pdbs
help: flag to dump intermediate pdbs

name: dump_pdbs
help: TODO

name: dump_scaffold_pdbs
help: flag to output pdbs of just the design scaffold WITHOUT initial RNA structure useful for really big structures

name: new_ensembles
help: flag to include new structural ensembles

name: no_out_file
help: if you only want the summary and not the actual structures

name: out_file
help: output file that contains all information to rebuild solutions

name: score_file
help: name of output file containining scoring information for design

name: ending_helix
help: ending helix for design solution. Format = [TODO]

name: exhaustive_scorer
help: TODO

name: max_helix_length
help: maximum number of basepairs in a solution helix

name: mc_scorer
help: TODO

name: min_helix_length
help: minimum number of basepairs in a solution helix

name: motif_path
help: TBD

name: no_basepair_checks
help: flag to disable basepair checks

name: scaled_score_d
help: TODO

name: scaled_score_r
help: TODO

name: search_cutoff
help: TODO

name: search_max_size
help: maximum number of steps for a design search

name: search_type
help: search type for traversing motif space

name: solution_filter
help: TODO

name: starting_helix
help: starting helix for design solution. Format = [TODO]

name: no_sterics
help: turns off sterics checks againsts supplied RNA structure

name: only_tether_opt
help: gnore supplied structure other than sterics

name: search_max_motifs
help: TODO

name: skip_sequence_optimization
help: flag to skip sequence optimization of the design

name: sequences_per_design
help: number of sequences to try per motif design

name: seq_opt_steps
help: TODO

name: thermo_fluc
help: run thermo fluc procedure to estimate thermo fluc of helices

name: thermo_fluc_steps
